numbers.missing: You need to provide another number!
numbers.tooMany: You have given too many numbers!
numbers.notInRange: The number you provided is not in the accepted range!
numbers.intOnly: You need to provide an integer!
numbers.decimalsOnly: You need to provide a number that is not an integer!

mentions.BotMention: You cannot mention the bot for this command!
mentions.SelfMention: You cannot mention yourself for this command!
mentions.invalid: The mention you provided is invalid!

privilege.BotTooLow: My permissions are not ranked high enough to perform this command!
privilege.DisabledCommand: The command is Disabled and you cannot run it!
privilege.BlackListedUser: You are blacklisted, you cannot use any commands! You can message the Creator to appeal!
privilege.MissingPermissions: You do not have the needed permissions to run this command!
privilege.CreatorOnly: This command cannot be run by anyone, except the creator!

WeAreScrewed.BadApiResponse: The site gave us an invalid response, please try again later or check that the details you gave us are valid!
WeAreScrewed.ExecutionError: Something went wrong! Please inform the developers if the issue(s) persist(s)!

BotDownTime.editMode: We are making changes the bot! Please be patient, the bot will not do anything to avoid breaking anything! I apologize for problem(s) this might cause!
BotDownTime.maintenance: The bot is not up due to maintenance! I apologize for the problem(s) this may cause!
